column4: :/ I have an exe file I want to run with wine on my desktop (its an installer) how do I do this?
what do i open .bin files with?
chmod +x program.bin if it doesn't work
cool thanks, yeah it wanted to open with virus scanner rather than file roller
what kind of .bin is it? where did you get it from?
if you downloaded from google then you should be safe. I don't know of any virus programs for Linux ^^
I saw some guy with a skimask on the corner of astalivista and a cracker website handing them out ;P
si all i would do is go the directory and type "chmod +x GoogleEarthLinux.bin" ?
nope, that will only make the file executable
when it is, you run it with ./Google....bin
you must prefix with ./ because UNIX needs you to run stuff by telling directory paths
you are a good teacher..  most people just give quick answers.. u actually explain them.. thanks for teaching me how to fish
np, I learn better by explaining :)
